name: Water & Fire Stickman 3D
description:
Red and Blue will take you into an adventurous world where has many intriguing challenges waiting for you. This world adventure game belongs to puzzle game category with addictive gameplay. Red and Blue is a 4 button game, including jump button, navigation button, switch button and zoom button.
Red and Blue game is based on the story of two characters in stickman kingdom, known as fireboy and watergirl. On a beautiful day, fireboy and watergirl decided to go camping in the forest near their house. Unfortunately, they got lost and couldn't find the way back to their sweet home. While looking for a way to escape, they accidentally met the king and queen of the stickman kingdom who were kidnaped.
In stickman wallpaper, your mission is joining the enigma adventure and using clever strategy to help the boy and girl escape the forest. Simultaneously, you will become a warrior fighting to rescue king and queen from the carnage. There are many traps and must be overcome before they can be back sweet home. You have to complete missions of the conundrum and maze puzzle.

HOW TO PLAY
- Control the fireboy and watergirl to move with the navigation button.
- Press the jump button to help the characters jump to a higher step.
- Enlarge and shrink by using the zoom button.
- Transform between red and blue with the switch button. Note that, boy and girl cannot move at the same time. If you transform into a boy, the girl will freeze.
- Look for the blue keys and red key to open the corresponding colored doors. However, only fireboy can collect the red key, and the blue keys belong to watergirl.
- The tips to unravel the maze puzzle faster are to pay attention to the stone or teleport doors. The teleport, stone and uncharted items are very useful to unravel the conundrum and maps.
- The world adventure game also has special obstacles that only characters with the corresponding color can overcome such as lava, firepower, raven, bluefire and bluestar. Use parkour skills and be careful not to bruise!
- In the arena, you need to nourish your warrior stickman to fight monsters. Warrior stickman should outlast as long as possible.
- Don’t forget to earn gold and hearts.
- Daily rewards, lucky spin and gift are waiting for you.
- Not only have red and blue skin, but the characters could also change outfit and cosplay many famous superheroes.

GAME FEATURES
1. Beautiful graphic
- The stickman wallpaper and impressive interface brings an excellent user experience.
2. Unique items
- There are many special items such as teleport and stone, unique obstacles for example firepower, bluestar, raven, lave and bluefire.
3. Simple and addictive gameplay
- 4 game button with the task of finding the blue keys and red keys.
4. Superhero cosplay
- New outfits will help watergirl and fireboy cosplay superheroes.
